snippet.title: BloodbornePSX - A PSX-style demake of the bestselling action role-playing game!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://b0tster.itch.io/bbpsx?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Travel to the gothic Victorian city of Yharnam, whose blood-soaked roads are filled with unspeakable terrors hidden behind every corner.

Wield over 10 unique hunter weapons using the Strategic Action Combat system to vanquish your foes. Dodge incoming attacks with your hunter's quick step ability, parry enemies with your quicksilver firearm, and transform your trick weapon to tailor your loadout for any encounter in this new, next generation 3D experience that blends RPG and Action in a way you've been seen before.

Only one question remains: Can you survive the night?

➡️ More from b0tster https://b0tster.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More horror games https://itch.io/games/tag-horror?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames #horror
